Description:
Required skills to be successful2 to 3 years’ experience as a Diagnostic Technician coming from a big automotive dealership doing diagnosis and general mechanic repairs
Ability to use the diagnostic equipment’s & Special Service Tools to inspect Engine, Transmission, Brake, suspension A/C electrical and hybrid system of the vehicles
Ability to do basic diagnosis, unit repair, AC parts replacement and mechanical repairs.
 About the teamThe role will report to the Workshop Manager and you will be working in a busy workshop environment wherein you will be dealing directly with Service Advisor, Controller, Foreman & co-Technicians in a daily basis. What equips you for the roleDiploma Technical certification, ITI (Industrial Training Institute NCVT Certificate) or ITC 
2 to 3 years’ experience as Diagnostic Technician
Added value in having valid UAE driving license
Must read, interpret and transcribe data in order to maintain accurate records in job orders
Understands and works within protocol where necessary, and understands and performs to the requirements of AFM Toyota After sales
Conversant in EnglishJob Details
